column2: BRIEF-Beazer Homes Qtrly Homebuilding Revenue Of $441.1 Million, Up 4.6% May 2 (Reuters) - Beazer Homes USA Inc: * BEAZER HOMES REPORTS STRONG SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * BEAZER HOMES USA INC - QTRLY HOMEBUILDING REVENUE OF $441.1 MILLION, UP 4.6% * BEAZER HOMES USA INC - QTRLY DILUTED INCOME PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.36 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
